name: Team Sports
description: Includes products and services related to organized team sports, such as equipment, apparel, and facilities for sports like football, basketball, baseball, and soccer.

name: Individual Sports
description: Covers products and services for individual sports, including equipment, apparel, and training for activities like tennis, golf, swimming, and running.

name: Outdoor Recreation
description: Encompasses products and services for outdoor activities, such as camping, hiking, fishing, and boating, including gear, apparel, and guided tours.

name: Fitness and Wellness
description: Includes products and services focused on physical fitness and wellness, such as gym equipment, fitness classes, and personal training.

name: Sports Technology
description: Covers companies that develop and provide technology solutions for the sports industry, including data analytics, wearable devices, and virtual reality training tools.

name: Sports Media and Entertainment
description: Encompasses companies that produce and distribute sports-related content, including broadcasting, streaming, and publishing.

name: Sports Facilities and Management
description: Includes companies that design, build, and manage sports facilities, such as stadiums, arenas, and recreation centers.

name: Sports Education and Training
description: Covers companies that provide educational programs, coaching, and training services for athletes, coaches, and sports professionals.

name: Sports Tourism
description: Encompasses companies that organize and promote sports-related travel, including event packages, team travel, and sports-themed vacations.

name: Sports Apparel and Footwear
description: Includes companies that design, manufacture, and distribute sports-related apparel and footwear.

name: Sports Equipment and Accessories
description: Covers companies that design, manufacture, and distribute sports equipment and accessories, such as balls, bats, and protective gear.
